content:
I'd like to suggest a possible mechanism for improving the dev guide: section reviews.

Some background: I'm trying to learn more about macro expanasion and name resolution. I read the sections on lexing/parsing and macro expansion, and I wrote down my impressions - a collection of thoughts on improvements, and things that didn't make sense to me. https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-dev-guide/issues/1165

Perhaps others could provide feedback on sections. Often these impressions are left unreported because each on an individual level don't really merit an issue. Do we think this could be a useful mechanism for trying to improve sections? If so, we could provide a generic template and encourage anyone who needs to read a section to fill out the template.
